alternateName: Daily Mobile Apps ScreenTime and Usage Patterns Analysis

distribution.name: archive.zip
distribution.description: Archive containing all the contents of the Mobile Apps ScreenTime Analysis dataset

distribution.name: screentime_analysis.csv
distribution.description:
This File is:  **CSV (Comma Separated Value)**


### Use Cases:

- Analyze app usage trends over time.

- Investigate relationships between notifications and app engagement.

- Build predictive models for user behavior.

- Explore digital **wellbeing** and screen-time management strategies.


This dataset contains informations about **Mobile App Screentime and Usage**, providing insights into their characteristics. The dataset includes details such as Date, App, Notifications, Times Opened.

field.name: Date
field.description: date on which the data was recorded.

field.name: App
field.description: name of the application being used.

field.name: Usage (minutes)
field.description: total number of minutes spent on the app each day.

field.name: Notifications
field.description: number of notifications received from the app each day.

field.name: Times Opened
field.description: number of times the app was opened on the recorded day.

### Use Cases:

- Analyze app usage trends over time.

name: Mobile Apps ScreenTime Analysis
description:
# ***Don't forget to hit the upvote🙏***

This DataSet Contains Detailed Insights into **Mobile App Usage Patterns, including ScreenTime**, notifications received, and app openings. The data spans multiple days in August and some popular apps, offering a granular view of digital behavior.


## Features:

#### 1. Date: ***The date of the recorded data.***

#### 2. App: ***The name of the mobile application.***

#### 3. Usage (minutes): ***Total minutes spent using the app on a given day.***

#### 4. Notifications: ***Number of notifications received from the app.***

#### 5. Times Opened: ***How many times the app was launched.***
